basic.description: This course focuses on dynamic motions and life processes in the marine environment. Long-term geologic history of the oceans and recent changes caused by man. An overview of oceanography for upper-division students majoring in science, mathematics, or science teaching.
basic.subject: OCE
basic.title: Principles of Oceanography

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: A science major or minor status and junior or senior standing.
